price: 20. Kaadu anu diggaluk yi-Rabbiiy sin- Rabbi kinni Rabbi eleelita xeetit yoo qiddaanamak.
arabic: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī ʿudh'tu birabbī warabbikum an tarjumūni
